title: The Start of Something Great?
text: [My parents keep telling me how this is a new start for us, and how much fun this will be...]
[But I have to wonder... What will things be like here?]
...And boy there sure are a lot of trees...

text: This has been the longest day of my life.

title: His Second Favorite is Lucky Captain Rabbit King Nuggets
